WebTransportSendStream.summary: NOTE Experimental The WebTransportSendStream interface of the {{domxref("WebTransport API", "WebTransport API", "", "nocode")}} is a specialized that is used to send outbound data in both unidirectional or bidirectional streams.

remarks.para:
The send stream is a writable stream of Uint8Array, that can be written to in order to send data to a server.
It additionally provides streaming features such as setting the send order, and getting stream statistics.

Objects of this type are not constructed directly.
When creating a unidirectional stream the returns an object of this type for sending data.
When creating a bidirectional stream using , the method returns a , and the send stream object can be obtained from its property.
When a bidirectional stream is initiated by the remote end, an object of this type can similarly be obtained using .
